item.title: People Called A Black Woman–Owned Company “Racist” After A Target Ad. Its Sales Have Doubled, The Owner Said.
item.description: People vowed to stop buying the Honey Pot Company’s products after they claimed it was “racist,” but the company’s sales have since doubled, its owner said. People Called A Black Woman–Owned Company “Racist” After A Target Ad.

item.title: All About CFIUS, Trump’s Watchdog on China Dealmaking: QuickTake
item.description: Who’s on the committee? CFIUS – pronounced SIFF-ee-yus – is a panel of government officials that reviews acquisitions of American businesses by foreign buyers to determine if the deals pose risks to national security.

item.title: You can earn more than $100,000 when you work from home in one of these jobs
item.description: The lure of remote work is obvious. In addition to sleeping an hour or so later, depending on your commute, you can save a lot of money. For instance, the costs of a formal work wardrobe, lunch out and traveling to an office.

item.title: What Are Merchant Services? Everything Freelancers Need to Know
This Entrepreneur Runs a Thriving $76-plus Million Freelance Marketplace Business with No Employees
item.description: Michael Brooks launched goLance in 2015 with the objective of offering lower fees for freelancers, giving people the freedom to work from home February 17, 2020 9 min read Opinions expressed by Entrepreneur contributors are their own.

item.title: The Future of Work Is Here. Freelance Economy Offers Unparalleled Opportunity for Growth; Moves to Close the Gender Pay Gap
item.description: NEW YORK, Feb. 05, 2020 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) – Payoneer today issued its Freelancer Income Report based on a survey of over 7,000 freelancers from 150 countries, providing new insight into the world of freelancers, their motivations and how this unique workforce empowers global collaboration by connecting top talent with businesses anywhere in the world.

item.title: Report Shows Freelancers Have The Highest Average Hourly Rate, But There Is Much More To It
item.description: With all the technological advancements and shifting of work paradigms, there is a widespread understanding that the freelance economy is on the rise. People are preferring to work independently in order to balance their work and personal life in a better way, along with the fact that social media and online market places are giving them the opportunity to sell their work in a better way.

item.title: I just left my 6-figure day job to become a full-time freelance writer. Here's how I planned for such a massive career change.
item.description: At the end of 2019, Wendy Fox left her six-figure job in senior leadership at a tech company. She decided to take the plunge to become a full-time freelancer and author, having already published three books while she held a day job.

item.title: How to find clients and market your business as an independent web designer, according to 6-figure freelancers who did it
item.description: The average annual salary for freelance web designers is around $56,000, but some successful freelancers have climbed into the $100,000 range. These three high-earning web designers hit their stride when they diversified their client base and talents.

item.title: Freelancing, Finances and Loneliness
item.description: You don’t need to win the lottery to quit your job. All you need to do is ask yourself if it’s worth giving up 10 percent of your salary to have 10 percent more free time.

item.title: Going freelance was one of the best decisions I've made for my health — here's why
item.description: For Lindsay Patton-Carson, being fired from her job ended up being a blessing in disguise — she was finally able to get control of her health. As a full-time freelancer, she can now make appointments without asking permission and rest and exercise when she needs to.

item.title: Best freelance websites in 2020
item.description: Freelancers looking to earn more money now have more options than ever before. Whether you are freelancing full-time, looking to earn some pound or dollar on the side, or are looking for a freelancer to help you do some work, these are some of the best freelance websites that you should be considering in 2020.

item.title: Afraid to increase your rates as a freelancer? Here's how one 6-figure presentation designer does it.
item.description: Adrienne Johnston left her job in financial services to be a freelance graphic designer in 2018, despite having no experience in the industry. She carved out a niche in presentation design and earned $200,000 in her second year of freelancing.

item.title: 8 survival secrets for freelance creatives
item.description: Mastering creative process is one of the hardest things to do, especially as a freelancer. Juggling all the admin things you need to stay on top of, all while keeping your creativity and inspiration flowing, can quickly start to feel overwhelming.

item.title: 【北海道】JR Pass省錢玩札幌、小樽、函館、美瑛、富良野
item.description: 【日本】北海道JR Pass交通攻略，省錢玩札幌、小樽、函館、
